data.title: Parallel Interferometric GPU Imager
data.name: Pigi
data.description: Pigi (pronounced like 'piggy') is the parallel interfermetric GPU imager for producing images from radio astronomy observations.

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "Download the [`singuarity.def`](https://github.com/torrance/Pigi/blob/main/singularity.def) build script and create your container:"
"The Parallel Interferometric GPU Imager (Pigi; pronounced like 'piggy') is a prototypal imager for radio astronomy currently in development" (domain-specific imager application).

Installation is described via cloning/building and container definition: "Download the `singularity.def` build script and create your container" and "Pigi uses a standard CMake build process" (source-based distribution, no registry mentioned).
